transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji. 
Customer: Hello Kailash ji baat kar raha hu. 
Executive: Haan ji. 
Customer: Sir Faraz baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se, aawaz aa rahi hai? 
Customer: Haan ji haan ji aawaz aa rahi hai. 
Executive: Haan ji kaise hai sir aap? 
Customer: Badhiya. 
Executive: Ummeed hai aap badhiya honge. 
Customer: Haan ji. 
Executive: Haan ji badhiya ji sir toh bole sir kal woh discussion hua tha na sir Vimal ke saath woh pending tha. 
Customer: Vimal ne try kiya tha aap se ek baar thoda time de dijiye sir baat karne ke liye. 
Executive: Time sir abhi morning ke time phone karte hai aap bhi shaam ko phone karte hai. 
Customer: Aapko pata hai sir shaam ko bhi kiya tha phone sir aap kal toh. 
Executive: Toh aap number woh change karke kyun phone karte ho sir yeh jo number aapko save kar rakha hai. 
Customer: Sir number mera yeh yeh bhi number hai woh dono hi number hai sir. 
Executive: Haan. 
Executive: Main theek hai aap kis baare mein discussion kar ek toh sir mere ko main dikkat yeh aa rahi thi ki main call kar raha hu toh aapke paas uski complaint bhi note hogi PNS ke dwara mere paas call nahi aa rahi hai. 
Executive: Pehle toh isko mere ko solution chahiye is cheez ka. 
Customer: Matlab aap kya kar rahe ho aap phone apne apne number pe apne number pe aap phone kar rahe hai? 
Executive: Mere kehne ka matlab hai ki mere customer ne mere paas call kiya. 
Executive: Theek hai. 
Executive: Toh woh call mere paas nahi aake aapke customer care mein chali gayi call. 
Customer: Woh toh jaati hai sir yeh humara call uthate nahi hai sir. 
Executive: Call aani toh chahiye na sir call aani toh chahiye main saamne baitha hua tha maine saamne baith ke call kiya tha bilkul toh abhi mere paas call nahi aayi. 
Customer: Accha ek baar aise check karenge sir aapne IndiaMART buyer ka number hai woh aapne block toh nahi kar rakha hai main aapko number bata deta hu. 
Executive: Nahi sir maine pehle check kar chuka hu yeh cheeze main. 
Customer: Save hai na aapke mein sir yeh. 
Executive: Bilkul bilkul main save tha woh bhi un save kar diya usko bhi main by chance save karne ki wajah se dikkat aa gayi toh abhi main. 
Customer: Nahi nahi save kariye. 
Customer: Haan ji yeh number save kariye sir save. 
Executive: Yeh toh ek hi toh 42994299 sir. 
Customer: Haan mere ko pata hai ji aise 42994299 hai. 
Executive: Haan haan save kariye. 
Customer: Haan number toh mere ko dhyan hai lekin save na bhi kare toh kya dikkat hai usme call toh aayegi na. 
Customer: Nahi sir save karne se kya hota hai na kabhi kabhi android kya karta hai na android phone toh auto spam mein kar deta hai 80 wale number jo hote hai. 
Executive: Auto spam sir kaise hoyega auto spam mera iphone hai toh usme true caller wagera use nahi karta auto spam kaise hoyega. 
Customer: Sir theek hai koi dikkat nahi save karne mein yeh benefit hai ki aapko yaad rehta hai sir IndiaMART buyer ka phone number. 
Executive: Woh toh mere ko yaad hai lekin call toh aani chahiye na sir yaad rakh ke kya karenge. 
Customer: Sir yeh wale concern ke liye main ek baar iska issue raise karta hu sir yeh PNS team ko ek baar test call karenge sir. 
Executive: Pehle yeh pehle pehle jo yeh meri problem hai na PNS wali yeh solve kijiye phir uske aage dusri problem bataunga main pehle isko solve kariye. 
Customer: Koi baat nahi koi baat nahi iske liye main ek concern raise kar raha hu sir humari technical team aapko phone kar legi sir toh test call bhi kar legi woh aapka check kar legi mobile number mein kuch issue hai network ka issue hai toh yeh wali issue solve ho jayegi sir aap bataiye iske alawa. 
Executive: Bas pehle isko solve kijiye phir aage batayenge. 
Customer: Baaki sir inquiry wagera ko leke bataye sir. 
Executive: Tumhe pehle bata toh raha hu sir pehle isko ek problem solve ho phir next karenge isko aage. 
Customer: Haan phir continue karenge pehle ek ek ek ek problem solve karte jayenge phir continue karenge aage. 
Executive: Theek hai ji. 
Customer: Chaliye koi baat nahi sir main iska ek baar ek naya concern raise kar de raha hu sir. 
Executive: Haan haan aapke mail pe uska ho jayega aur ek ek cheez aur jaise aapke mere jo machines se related jo bhi keywords aap mere ko send kar sakte hai ki kaun kaun se keywords is time running hai google pe jyada search ho rahe hai. 
Customer: Sir woh aap ek baar video meeting pe aayenge main aapko dikha dunga sir baaki companies ka catalog khol ke. 
Executive: Nahi baaki companies ka catalog nahi dekhna jaise google pe kaun kaun se keyword is time search ho rahe hai woh aap mere ko bata sakte hai. 
Customer: Woh woh sir IndiaMART khud suggest karta hai main aapko dikha dunga kya hota hai na jaise tape slicer machine hai sir aapka. 
Executive: Haan haan. 
Customer: Jab aap tape slicer machine ko IndiaMART ki directory pe search karte ho sir toh left side mein aapko IndiaMART khud batata hai ki tape slicer machine ko aap kis kis naam se search kar sakte hai toh main aapko bhijwa dunga aap mere ko product de dena kis naam ka kaun sa product hai sir uska main keyword aapko bhijwa dunga. 
Executive: Haan mere ko jo hai sir yeh jo coating machines hai na yeh coating machine aur slitting machine inke keywords pata karne ki coating machine jaise coating machine kis naam se search ho rahi hai aur slitting machine kis naam se search ho rahi hai. 
Customer: Sir jaise tape coating machine. 
Executive: Haan yeh jitni bhi coating machine hai mere coating machine mein teen chaar product hai toh coating machine aur slitting machine slitting rewinding machine. 
Customer: Samajh gaya. 
Executive: Haan mere ko inke keywords. 
Customer: Jaise main aapko dikhau tape coating machine hai sir adhesive tape coating machine ke naam se search ho raha hai cello tape machine ke naam se search ho raha hai tape slitting line ke naam se search ho raha hai BOPP tape slitting machine ke naam se ho raha hai silicon coating kis naam se ho raha hai yeh saare aa rahe hai sir IndiaMART bhi dikhata hai sir yeh. 
Executive: Haan wohi mere ko wohi main haan yeh bhijwa dijiye phir woh us hisab se apna product. 
Customer: Haan whatsapp pe bhijwa dijiye mere product ka name change. 
Executive: Sir mere ko karega aap bol do bata do product ka name bata do yeh main add karwa deta hu aapko. 
Executive: Nahi main khud khud check kar lunga main ek baar kya hai ki mere ko agar list mil jayegi. 
Customer: Theek hai sir saare product ka saare product ka keyword main aapko whatsapp pe Vimal ke number se karwa de raha hu sir. 
Executive: Theek hai sir. 
Executive: Theek hai sir. 
Customer: Theek hai na aur iske alawa bataiye sir yeh number wala bhi solve ho jayega sir yeh koi bahut bada issue nahi hai sir yeh ho sakta hai koi technical issue ho toh woh uska main concern raise kar. 
Executive: 4299 bahut bahut hi accha hai dekha jaye toh bahut bada issue hai sir yeh. 
Customer: Nahi nahi sir matlab yeh solve hona koi badi baat nahi hai main ek baar ticket khol dunga. 
Executive: Woh woh solve hona badi baat nahi hai ki us issue toh bahut bada hai sir. 
Customer: Nahi aapne bataya sahi keh rahe hai sir technical workout karke accha hai sir. 
Executive: Theek hai sir. 
Customer: Baaki sir Vimal ke liye aap mention kar rahe the Vimal se aap satisfied nahi hai kya bataiye sir kisi aur ko align karna hai. 
Executive: Kisi aur ko jo experienced ho na unko align kijiye jaise mere ko abhi tak response nahi mila jis hisab se maine upgrade karane ke baad bhi ab kya catalog mein issue hai ya kaha issue hai mere ko main dekho yeh cheeze aap pakad payenge main nahi pakad sakta is cheez ko. 
Customer: Sir Vimal guide toh kar raha hoga na sir aise toh yeh toh hota nahi hoga sir Vimal. 
Executive: Ek ek cheez hai ki main maine jaise aapko problem bata di aap usko solution dhund ke sort out kijiye ab anytime har time toh yeh nahi ki main desktop pe anytime google meet ke available rahu main maine problem bata di toh aap apne end se isko solve kijiye main yeh chahta hu na ki main complaint karu complaint karte haan ji google meet kariye aap google meet kariye toh yeh possible nahi hota sir anytime. 
Customer: Koi koi issue nahi hai sir main aapko video meeting pe bol dunga Vimal se baar baar aapko na jab tak bahut jyada important nahi hai. 
Executive: Aap without meet video without video meeting ke solve kijiye. 
Customer: Chaliye. 
Executive: Theek hai koshish ho agar aaj bahut bahut jyada jaruri ho ki aaj hi without video meeting ke without nahi ho payega yeh sab. 
Customer: Aur yeh sir ek toh do mahine mein ek baar toh aap arrange kariye video meeting toh aapko bhi thoda samajhne mein aasaani rehti hai roz roz karne ki requirement nahi hai sir. 
Executive: Kai kai main ab ek baat jaane sir hum bhi aap jaan rahe ho kaam kar rahe hai. 
Executive: Apni line mein itna busy rehte hai ki hum aap video call meet karke agar hume samjha bhi doge toh woh ek do din mein ya teen chaar din mein bhool jayenge hum jab tak practice nahi hoti aap cheeze pata hai bhool jaate hai toh hume samjhane se koi fayda nahi hai woh hume response results chahiye na. 
Executive: Haan haan correct hai. 
Executive: Haan. 
Customer: Sir meri dekhiye aap se last meeting meri hui hai aapko yaad hai woh 19 September ko uske baad se toh meeting hui hi nahi hai. 
Executive: Aap apne hisab se bata diya kariye jab aap free rehte hai sir aisa koi woh nahi hai ki hum aapko meeting hi karni hai. 
Executive: Main main batata hu main khud main khud karta hu sir aapke paas meet ho toh batao. 
Customer: Sorry. 
Executive: Main khud call karta hu unke paas bhi karta hu aapke paas bhi karta hu ki mere ko issue lagta hai toh koi meri yeh dikkat aa gayi toh sort out kijiye. 
Customer: Koi baat nahi sir aisa karke chalenge Vimal ko bol dunga ki baar baar aapko video meeting ke liye na bole aur yeh saara concern. 
Executive: Haan without without meet video meeting ke liye solve ki jaye jab video meet ke liye free hounga toh main khud hi kar lunga aage mere ko iske bataiye hai na ek response aana chahiye sir aisa na hai ki main paise laga raha hu mere ko kuch response nahi mil pa raha. 
Executive: Main is cheez ke liye kai baar bol chuka hu. 
Customer: Sir aap by lead by lead ka bhi sir slow matlab use karne ka aapka kam ho raha hai is month aap dekhenge toh thoda requirement sir sir requirement aayegi tabhi toh karenge. 
Executive: Ab jab by lead agar mere related mere liye related agar usme show hi nahi hogi toh main kaha se kya karunga yeh main starting se bolte hue aa raha hu ki by leads meri nahi mil pa rahi properly by lead mere ko nahi mil pa rahi. 
Executive: Isse related kai baar main bol chuka hu. 
Customer: Yeh main dono dono kaam ke liye karata hu keywords aapko whatsapp pe lata hu aur iska yeh concern raise kar deta hu PNS team ko woh aapko phone kar lenge shaam tak phone aa jayega aapke paas. 
Executive: Theek hai. 
Customer: Theek hai sir baaki sir yeh wala concern main close kar de raha hu PNS wala khol de raha hu aapko main concern toh yeh hai na ticket wala hisab se recall wala. 
Executive: Nahi do teen concern hai mere sir jo maine do teen ticket khulwa rakhi hai un dono ko solve kijiye. 
Customer: Yeh existing band kar du sir yeh Vimal wala yeh puch raha hu Vimal ke liye jo aapne bheja tha agar aap bolte hai toh yeh wala main open kar deta hu aapke liye. 
Executive: Agar isse agar inse inse koi jyada experienced wala hai toh usko mera account de dijiye taki manage kar paye. 
Customer: Chaliye pehle sir main aapke ticket close karke ek naya ticket khol deta hu calls wala bhi call nahi aa rahi aapke paas toh shaam tak aapke paas call arrange kara deta hu kisi aur account mein bhi theek hai sir. 
Executive: Call ka arrange karwa yaar ek jo aap mera account manage jo assist kar rahe hai jinko experienced ho minimum se minimum seven to eight years aapki waha IndiaMART mein usko assist kijiye mere liye jisse meri problem jo aa rahi hai solve ho main starting se kai baar bol chuka hu sir ki meri jo bhi aapne catalog banaya hua hai usko ek basic se leke check kiya jaye kahi na kahi mere catalog mein problem hai ab woh kaha problem hai yeh cheez aap bhi dekh sakte hai sir yeh main nahi dekh sakta kaha kya problem hai lekin hai kahi na kahi jo meri visibility nahi aa rahi hai mere paas by leads nahi aa rahi hai. 
Customer: Samajh gaya. 
Customer: Theek hai sir main yeh Gaurav Shukla phone karega meri team se Gaurav experienced hai. 
Executive: Theek theek hai ji. 
Customer: Sir 7-8 saal toh nahi lekin 3-4 saal se woh hai usko idea hai better thoda sa woh aapko guide bhi kar dega pehle main aapko yeh concern raise kar deta hu yeh Vimal wala main close kar deta hu uska ek feedback aayega mail pe aapke paas usme aap satisfied kar dijiye shaam tak aapko call mil jayega. 
Executive: Theek hai. 
Executive: Theek hai. 
Customer: Theek hai abhi jo keywords bhijwaunga na aapko sir woh main Vimal ke number se bhijwa dunga sir. 
Executive: Theek hai theek hai. 
Customer: Theek hai. 
Executive: Okay. 
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving calls; calls going to customer care.

- Wants keywords for coating and slitting machines.

- Dissatisfied with current account manager, Vimal.

- By leads are not relevant and not receiving properly.



Resolution:

- Executive raised a concern for the PNS issue.

- Technical team will call to check the issue.

- Will arrange a test call to check mobile/network issue.

- Will provide keywords via WhatsApp from Vimal's number.

- Will assign Gaurav Shukla as new account manager.



Next Steps: 

- Technical team will call the customer.

- Customer will receive keywords on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- call issue, keywords, account manager, buyleads, pns
